Using cURL To Test Exchange Web Services

26 Jan 2014

From this post, I learned how to write a little shell script that uses cURL to check to see if I’m connecting to the Exchange Web Services server correctly. This made testing my Python EWS script easier, especially when I accidentally connected to the wrong WiFi network and couldn’t contact the EWS server.

This will read back the schema from the WSDL file if you’ve successfully connected to the server.
